original_text: You people of Babylon, who live beside many rivers, it is now time for you to die. You have become rich with many valuable things, but now your lives will finish.’ 51: Babylon was beside the big Euphrates river and there were many other small rivers (canals). The rich people were traders who brought things from other countries. You people of Babylon, who live beside many rivers,
korean_text: 많은 물 가에 살면서 재물이 많은 자여 네 재물의 한계 곧 네 끝이 왔도다

sentences.original_text: it is now time for you to die
You have become rich with many valuable things
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 많은 귀한 것들로 부자가 되었다

sentences.original_text: but now your lives will finish
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이제 너희의 삶이 끝날 것이다

sentences.original_text: Babylon was beside the big Euphrates river
and there were many other small rivers (canals)
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다른 많은 작은 강들(운하)이 있었다

sentences.original_text: who brought things from other countries
